{"id":1001484128,"question_id":2872,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690083389,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1001484128/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Largest Element in an Array after Merge Operations","memory":"57.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maxArrayValue(int[] nums) {\n        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        if(len==1)\n            return nums[0];\n        \n        long curr = nums[len-1];\n        long max = curr ;\n        for(int i=len-1; i>0; i--){\n            \n            if(curr>=nums[i-1]){\n                curr += nums[i-1];\n               \n            }else{\n                curr = nums[i-1];\n            }\n            \n            max= Math.max(max, curr);\n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return max;\n      \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"largest-element-in-an-array-after-merge-operations","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
